quest.name: Alisaie's Path
journal: Alisaie would bring the tale of the Seventh Umbral Calamity to a close.

Having banished the elder primal Bahamut to the aether, you and the Leveilleur twins are transported back to Dalamud's Talons in northern Thanalan. Make your way to the Ceruleum Processing Plant, and report the mission's success to Urianger.

If anything, Urianger seems more relieved at your safe return than glad of your victory─though it is indeed a proud achievement. Thanks to you, Bahamut is no more, and with all his worshipers eliminated, the primal shall never again return to threaten the realm. As Alphinaud and Urianger embark on their diplomatic mission to conceal the truth of the Calamity, Alisaie bids you accompany her to the Burning Wall in eastern Thanalan. Having offered a prayer to all those who lost their lives at the start of the Seventh Umbral Era, Alisaie declares that she will embark on a journey to find her own reason to fight for the realm. Inspired by your fine example, she pledges to help those in need, and grow stronger in so doing.
objectives: Report to Urianger at the Ceruleum Processing Plant.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And here we are again. After that descent into darkness, the desolation of northern Thanalan seems paradisal.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: As promised, I shan't reveal the truth of the Calamity to a single soul. However, the nations of Eorzea will require certain assurances that the threat of a new primal is gone.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Kept in the dark overlong, 'tis only a matter of time before they seek answers of their own accord. Let us recommend that the fragments of Dalamud are sealed off, that the truth may rest undisturbed.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: But first, we must go and report to Urianger. It would not do to keep him in suspense. I daresay we shall find him pacing up and down at the Ceruleum Processing Plant.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: In spite of your presence, I must confess that there were moments when I feared the worst. But in the end, you plucked us from the flames and bore us safe unto victory─just as you always have. As for Alisaie...I have never been more proud to call her my sister.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Let us go to the Ceruleum Processing Plant and report to Urianger. It would not do to keep him in suspense.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Ah, the Warrior of Light returneth undimmed from the depths of darkness...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: By thy triumphant bearing, I take it thou hast succeeded in thy mission. And yet thou art alone... Mistake me not, dear friend─full glad am I of thy safe return─but where, pray, are Master Alphinaud and Mistress Alisaie?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Here, my friend. Forgive us our lateness─we took the scenic route.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Bahamut is no more. The realm is safe.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: <gasp> By the heavens! Look at you!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: What horrors your young eyes must have seen! What suffering your young bodies must have borne!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Pray tell me─where are you hurt? Your wounds must needs be cleansed and dressed at once! I shall make for you a poultice which draweth out─

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Be at ease, my friend! We are hale and whole, I assure you!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We took a few tumbles, but the worst of our hurts are healed. I believe we have Grandfather to thank for that.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Master Louisoix? ...Then you met with him once more? But wherefore should Bahamut's thrall seek to ease your suffering?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I promise to reveal all to you in due course, dear friend. But first, there is a matter which requires our immediate attention.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Now that Bahamut is defeated, we deem it best to bar entry to all of the fragments of Dalamud.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: To this end, we will convince the nations' leaders that the danger is past, and invite their cooperation in ensuring that the fragments are never again disturbed. Come, let us depart and seek an audience with them forthwith.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: A moment, Sister. You need not burden yourself with this task. Urianger and I will more than suffice. Might you not take this opportunity to rest? The gods know you have earned it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: But I am fine, Brother. Besides, you have been through as much as I have.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Oh, I see now! You would play your game of diplomacy, and wish me out of the way!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: N-No, I... Naught could be further from the truth, Alisaie.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: My lady, 'tis mine earnest belief that your brother hath your best interests at heart. You have more than done your part, and he desireth but to relieve you of a burden he might easily bear alone.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have some experience treating with dignitaries, you must allow. And as you never fail to remind me of my fondness for diplomacy, I feel it only right that I remind you of your aversion to it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: (Marked for deletion)

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Then it is settled. Urianger─pray make arrangements for a chocobo carriage. The ride should give us ample time to prepare our story.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Alphinaud!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Though our paths are different, we share the same goal, do we not?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: But of course, dear sister. That which we have just achieved together stands as testament to that fact. Whatever path we choose to take, our hearts shall ever lead us to the same end, of that I am certain.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Thank you.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: There is a place that I would visit. Might I ask you to accompany me?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: But first, I do believe a change of garments is in order. It won't take a moment.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The landscape is the same. Of course, there is no reason that it would be otherwise.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Though it would be poetic for the fragments to magically disappear, I am well aware that they shall remain long after you and I are gone.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The world may change irrevocably, but life shall ever go on.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Let us take a closer look, shall we?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I have no doubt that Alphinaud will do an admirable job concealing the truth of the Calamity.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And such truths as were revealed in those dark depths will never see the light of day.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I myself agreed that it must be so...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: But the thought that the people of Eorzea shall forever remain ignorant of their savior─of your deeds... The injustice of it is almost too much for me to bear.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: How typical of you, Forename... Ever the heroinehero. Even so, I cannot deny that I feel better for your reassurance...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: But I want you to know that I will never forget. You are the one who freed Grandfather's soul and saved Eorzea from Bahamut's wrath.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And though these great deeds will never be remembered in song, their consequences will be felt forevermore by every soul who calls this realm home.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Yes, this spot will do.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: For Grandfather, Nael, and the dragons of Meracydia... For all those who were taken by the Calamity...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At long last, our struggle with Bahamut is over...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The realm, given new life through the prayers and sacrifices of countless souls, may look to a brighter tomorrow.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: When the dust of our adventure has settled, I shall embark on a journey.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I mean to find my own reason to fight for Eorzea.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And when I do, I will fight with all my being.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You have done so much for me, Forename. One day, I hope to be able to repay you in kind.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I have no doubt but that you will continue to help those in need, and grow ever stronger in so doing.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I shall endeavor to do the same. And if the Twelve are kind, I hope one day to become Eorzea's sword in the darkness─as you are.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Come what may, you may rest assured that I will not be outdone by Alphinaud.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: When next we meet, I promise that I will not disappoint you.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Till that day, fare you well, my friend. And thank you, from the bottom of my heart.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may view the opening cutscene for the Final Coil of Bahamut before accepting this quest.
